title: Texting while driving is a visual problem influenced by phone viewing angle and working distance in young individuals
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Stephen A. LoBue, Curtis R. Martin, Thomas M. Catapano, Kelli M. Coleman, Sarah Martin, Sofia Plascencia, Christopher L. Shelby, Wyche T. Coleman
